edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientCommandProcessor.commandSupport

Class FieldAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientCommandProcessor.commandSupport.FieldAccess

  • public class FieldAccess
extends Object
    Provides static methods for sending and retrieve data values to and from the the database which stores the fields and values. Provides conversion between the database to java objects.
    Author:
    westy, arun

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FieldAccess()

      • lookupJSONArray

        public static CommandResponse lookupJSONArray(String guid,
                                              String field,
                                              String reader,
                                              String signature,
                                              String message,
                                              Date timestamp,
                                              ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Supports reading of the old style data formatted as a JSONArray of strings. Much of the internal system data is still stored in this format. The new format also supports JSONArrays as part of the whole "guid data is a JSONObject" format so we might be transitioning away from this altogether at some point.
        Parameters:
        guid -
        field -
        reader -
        signature -
        timestamp -
        message -
        handler -
        Returns:
        a command response

        public static CommandResponse lookupMultipleValues(InternalRequestHeader header,
                                                   String guid,
                                                   String reader,
                                                   String signature,
                                                   String message,
                                                   Date timestamp,
                                                   ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Reads the value of all the fields in a guid. Doesn't return internal system fields.
        Parameters:
        guid -
        reader -
        signature -
        message -
        handler -
        Returns:
        a command response

      • update

        public static GNSResponseCode update(InternalRequestHeader header,
                                     String guid,
                                     String key,
                                     String value,
                                     String oldValue,
                                     int argument,
                                     UpdateOperation operation,
                                     String writer,
                                     String signature,
                                     String message,
                                     Date timestamp,
                                     ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Updates the field with value.
        Parameters:
        guid - - the guid to update
        key - - the field to update
        value - - the new value
        oldValue - - the old value - only applicable for certain operations, null otherwise
        argument - - for operations that require an index, -1 otherwise
        operation - - the update operation to perform... see UpdateOperation
        writer - - the guid performing the write operation, can be the same as the guid being written. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        signature - - the signature of the request. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        message - - the message that was signed. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        timestamp -
        handler -
        Returns:
        an NSResponseCode

      • update

        public static GNSResponseCode update(InternalRequestHeader header,
                                     String guid,
                                     String key,
                                     ResultValue value,
                                     ResultValue oldValue,
                                     int argument,
                                     UpdateOperation operation,
                                     String writer,
                                     String signature,
                                     String message,
                                     Date timestamp,
                                     ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Updates the field with value.
        Parameters:
        header -
        guid - - the guid to update
        key - - the field to update
        value - - the new value
        oldValue - - the old value - only applicable for certain operations, null otherwise
        argument - - for operations that require an index, -1 otherwise
        operation - - the update operation to perform... see UpdateOperation
        writer - - the guid performing the write operation, can be the same as the guid being written. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        signature - - the signature of the request. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        message - - the message that was signed. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        timestamp -
        handler -
        Returns:
        an NSResponseCode

      • updateUserJSON

                                             String message,
                                             Date timestamp,
                                             ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Sends an update request to the server containing a JSON Object.
        Parameters:
        header -
        guid - - the guid to update
        json - - the JSONObject to use in the update
        writer - - the guid performing the write operation, can be the same as the guid being written. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        signature - - the signature of the request. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        message - - the message that was signed. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        timestamp -
        handler -
        Returns:
        an NSResponseCode

      • create

        public static GNSResponseCode create(InternalRequestHeader header,
                                     String guid,
                                     String key,
                                     ResultValue value,
                                     String writer,
                                     String signature,
                                     String message,
                                     Date timestamp,
                                     ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Sends an update request to the server containing a JSON Object. This is a convenience method - one could use the update method.
        Parameters:
        header -
        guid - - the guid to update
        key - - the field to create
        value - - the initial value of the field
        writer - - the guid performing the create operation, can be the same as the guid being written. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        signature - - the signature of the request. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        message - - the message that was signed. Used for authentication at the server. Can be null for globally readable or writable fields or for internal operations done without a signature.
        timestamp -
        handler -
        Returns:
        a GNSResponseCode

                                     Object value,
                                     ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Sends a select request to the server to retrieve all the guids matching the request.
        Parameters:
        key - - the key to match
        value - - the value to match
        handler -
        Returns:
        a command response

      • selectWithin

        public static CommandResponse selectWithin(String key,
                                           String value,
                                           ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Sends a select request to the server to retrieve all the guids within an area specified by a bounding box.
        Parameters:
        key - - the field to match - should be a location field
        value - - a bounding box
        handler -
        Returns:
        a command response

      • selectNear

        public static CommandResponse selectNear(String key,
                                         String value,
                                         String maxDistance,
                                         ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Sends a select request to the server to retrieve all the guids within maxDistance of value.
        Parameters:
        key - - the field to match - should be a location field
        value - - the position
        maxDistance - - the maximum distance from position
        handler -
        Returns:
        a command response

      • selectGroupSetupQuery

        public static CommandResponse selectGroupSetupQuery(String accountGuid,
                                                    String query,
                                                    String publicKey,
                                                    int interval,
                                                    ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Sends a select request to the server to setup a context aware group guid and retrieve all the guids matching the query.
        Parameters:
        accountGuid -
        query -
        publicKey -
        interval - - the refresh interval (queries made more quickly than this will get a cached value)
        handler -
        Returns:
        a command response

      • selectGroupLookupQuery

        public static CommandResponse selectGroupLookupQuery(String guid,
                                                     ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
        Sends a select request to the server to retrieve the members of a context aware group guid.
        Parameters:
        guid - - the guid (which should have been previously initialized using selectGroupSetupQuery
        handler -
        Returns:
        a command response
